H0.text: Wind is the source from which almost all heat energy on Earth comes.

H1.text: Water is the source from which almost all heat energy on Earth originates.

H2.text: The Sun is the source from which almost all heat energy on Earth comes.

H3.text: The Moon is the source from which almost all heat energy on Earth originates.

A4.text: The Sun is the main source of energy for life on Earth.
